title: (x) Vivara logo - (similar to) Janson {Franz}
content:
I think [Janson](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/janson/urw-sc-t-regular/testdrive.html?s=VIVARA&p=72)'s Small Caps are similar.   
   
Here's a little comparison, your sample vs Janson SC vs Janson SC modified (which looks thicker than it's supposed to because I had to scale the tiny sample screenshot from MyFonts:   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25764.gif)
author: franz

comments.content: I also suspect the logo's A's are upside-down V's.
